## XQuiz WebHome xquiz.webhome.createnew=Create new Quiz xquiz.webhome.btncreate=Create this Quiz xquiz.webhome.listquiz=List of Quiz xquiz.webhome.quiz=Quiz xquiz.webhome.questions=Questions xquiz.webhome.author=Author xquiz.webhome.date=Date xquiz.webhome.action=Actions xquiz.webhome.view=View xquiz.webhome.delete=Delete
## XQuiz quizsheet xquiz.quizsheet.questions=Question xquiz.quizsheet.correctanswer=Correct Answer xquiz.quizsheet.noquestion=There is no question on this Quiz xquiz.quizsheet.addquestion=Add new question xquiz.quizsheet.quizinfo=You can include this Quiz on wiki page by adding this macro on your page : ( use wiki mode )
## UserResults macro xquiz.userresultsmacro.listquiz=Your results xquiz.userresultsmacro.results=Results xquiz.userresultsmacro.quiz=Quiz xquiz.userresultsmacro.note=Note xquiz.userresultsmacro.date=Date
## display response to quiz page xquiz.reponsequiz.title=Result of quiz xquiz.reponsequiz.question=Question : xquiz.reponsequiz.correctanswer=Correct Answer : xquiz.reponsequiz.yourresponse=Your response : xquiz.reponsequiz.noquestions=There is no question on this Quiz xquiz.reponsequiz.nopermissions=You can't modify this result.
## XQuiz service xquiz.service.createnewquiz=create new quiz xquiz.service.createnewresponse=create new response
## XQuiz display quiz macro xquiz.displayquizmacro.startbtn=Start the quiz xquiz.displayquizmacro.nextbtn=Next xquiz.displayquizmacro.finishbtn=Finish xquiz.displayquizmacro.yourresultbtn=Your result xquiz.displayquizmacro.selectoption=Please select an option xquiz.displayquizmacro.noquiz=There is no question on this Quiz ## XQuiz display quiz macro js xquiz.displayquizmacro.correct=Correct xquiz.displayquizmacro.wrong=Wrong xquiz.displayquizmacro.saveyourresult=Save your result xquiz.displayquizmacro.youscored=You scored xquiz.displayquizmacro.saveresult=Save result... xquiz.displayquizmacro.reseq100=Albus, is that you? xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf100=Outstanding, noble sir! xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf90=Exceeds expectations! xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf70=Acceptable. For a muggle. xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf50=Well, that was poor. xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf35=Dreadful! xquiz.displayquizmacro.resinf20=For shame, troll!
